subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: In what may have been a breakthrough game for both Ray Rice and the Scarlet Knights on national television, Rice scored two touchdowns and gained 202 yards on 35 carries in a victory over South Florida.
snippet: In what may have been a breakthrough game for both Ray Rice and the Scarlet Knights on national television, Rice scored two touchdowns and gained 202 yards on 35 carries in a victory over South Florida.
